dt-api.name: columns().types()
dt-api.summary: Get the data types for selected columns.

type.description: Get the configured or automatically detected data type for selected columns.
type.returns: API instance whose data set is the data types for the selected columns (will be strings).

dt-api.description:
This method is used to get the data types for selected columns. This is basically the same as the singular `-api column().type()` method, but in this case can be used to get the data type for multiple columns at the same time.
Please refer to the `-api column().type()` documentation for discussion on column data types.

example.title: Log the detected data types for all columns
